title: Winter moths
creator_credit: J.V. Durden, Stephen Ackroyd and Shell Film Unit
brief_description: Describes in detail the life cycle and habits of the true winter moth; the attack on the flower buds of fruit tress and later the much more destructive assaults on their foliage. Shows also the destruction caused by the March moth.
creator_credit_for_label: J.V. Durden, Stephen Ackroyd and Shell Film Unit
